recipe_name: Griddled spiced mango with honey, lime and chilli
author: James Tanner
method: Preheat the grill to the highest setting. Place the mango on a small non-stick baking tray. Drizzle the mango with the olive oil and sprinkle over the chilli flakes, honey and lime juice. Place the mango under the hot grill for 3-4 minutes, or until golden-brown. To serve, garnish with lime wedges and dust with icing sugar.
ingredients: ½ mango, stone removed and flesh scored,  2 tsp olive oil,  ¼ tsp chilli flakes,  1 tbsp clear honey,  ½ lime, juice only,  2 lime wedges, to garnish,  icing sugar, for dusting
